comment.author: 91829349@N00
comment._content: This photo's reversed, too, unless the Brazilian navy had the odd tradition of saluting with their left hands.

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Don't forget, Brazil is in the southern hemisphere. Doesn't their water go down the drains backwards? If they can eat upside down cake, they can probably salute backwards, too . . . .
